comment.author: 85162154@N03
comment._content: my friend was a student of Mandarin school shanghai ( www.mandarininn.cn/ )one year ago, one day he told me a beautiful poem which had been wrote by his Chinese teacher: I hear soem rustle of things behind my sadness of heart ——I cannot see them
